title: Blue Essence should be earned at the end of games like IP used to
body: I honestly just hope Riot takes a look at this. Earning a little BE at the end of games should still be a thing, just like we used to earn IP.

replies.body:
We're definitely taking a look across the boards for feedback, but the devs who can make changes like this won't see your post in Help & Support! Make sure you post feedback about game systems over in the appropriate boards (Gameplay or Client Discussion).

[**Riot Cactopus actually has a nice post over here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/hAaYMrEs-leveling-and-rewards-early-impressions-and-adjustments) talking about all of these changes, that'd be a good place to pop this feedback!
